Jimmy Connors
| runner   =  Ken Rosewall
| score    = 6–1, 6–3
| draw     = 32
| seeds    = 16
| edition  = 5
| type     = singles doubles
}}
Jimmy Connors claimed the title for the first time, defeating Ken Rosewall in the final.
